channel.title: Hobby on Водка
channel.description: Recent content in Hobby on Водка

item.title: Aircraft Model Collection in 2015
item.description: Info: This post covers all my aircraft models which collected in 2015. I missed some fantastic models in 2015… ID photo and basic model information: Order from newest to oldest [Phoenix] China Eastern Airlines A340-600, B-6055 “Expo 2010 Better City Better Life” Special Colour. Arrived at 2015-12-22. [Phoenix] EVA Airways B777-300ER, B-16703 “Hello Kitty Sanrio Family” Special Colour. Arrived at 2015-12-11. [GeminiJets] United Airlines B767-300ER(W), N674UA.

item.title: Aircraft Model Collection in 2014
item.description: Info: This post covers all my aircraft models which collected in 2014. Time flies very fasts…There was a large number models back to 2014. However, only 4 girls remained here today. ID photo and basic model information: Order from newest to oldest [Phoenix] China Airlines A330-300 B-18358 “Masalu Taiwan!” Special Colour. Arrived at 2014-09-08. [JC Wings] All Nippon Airways B767-300, JA8674 “60 Years Anniversary” Special Colour. Arrived at 2014-08-28.

item.title: Plane Spotting Summary 2020-09-29
item.description: Plane Spotting Summary 2020-09-29 Some nonsenses… This is a summary about some highlights in today’s plane spotting. Maybe I will post previous plane spotting photos in the future. Here are some basic information: Location: Chengdu Shuangliu International Airport (CTU/ZUUU) Runway 02R Date: 2020-09-29 Photos: Sichuan Airlines A319 B-6419 “Prototype of «The Captain», 3U8633事故机” Air China B747-8i B-2479 “VIP With B-2487 Cover” Air China B747-8i B-2482 Air China A350-900 B-1083 Juneyao Airlines B787-9 B-20D1 “Colorful Petals 绚彩花瓣” Special Color China Southern Airlines B787-9 B-1128 China Southern Airlines B777-300ER B-2029 Xiamen Airlines B787-9 B-1567 China Airlines A330-300 B-18355 Cathay Dragon A330-300 B-HLT ©All photos are copyright and some of them will be uploaded to my Jetphotos page:
